title: World Map
name: World Map
description:
A Map by Darrell48912

This is my eclectic mix of places around the world that I find of interest having experienced them firsthand, also there are many childhood memorable places from my hometown &amp; anything else that I think is of interest, feel free to comment on any of the places you find here.

properties.name: An old Mansion I used to live in
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912

properties.name: Another house I used to live in
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912I used to live here & could see the right field bleachers of Wrigley from my bedroom window.

properties.name: Beaumont Tower
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912Come listen to the Carillon with that someone special

properties.name: Caca Libre
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912There is a statue in this square of a gentelman sitting on a pile of books, they call it caca libre or "The Philosopher that shits books".

properties.name: El Azteco
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912The best local Mexican restaraunt, great Margarita\'s

properties.name: Hareprs
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912A local restaurant & brewpub known for there 1/2 off everything Wednesdays & there large patio.

properties.name: MSU Football Stadium
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912

properties.name: Munn Ice Arena
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912

properties.name: My Childhood Home
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912

properties.name: North Pier Entertainment Complex
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912This used to be a hopping entertainment complex before Navy Pier reopened, I was the sous chef at a place called "The Old Carolina Crabhouse"

properties.name: Piaza San Marco, Venice, Italy
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912

properties.name: Piaza San Marco, Venice, Italy
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912The main Paiza or Square in Venice, I would sit in this sqaure evry night listening to a 3 piece band play Dean Martin & Frank Sinatra while sipping red wine, doesn\'t get much better.

properties.name: Red Cedar Elementry school
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912

properties.name: Riva on Navy Pier
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912A 500 seat fine dining restaurant I was the opening Executive sous chef at.

properties.name: Riverfront Park
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912The home of the yearly music festival "Common Ground", also a walking & bike trail system that runs all the way to East Lansing.

properties.name: Rosebud on Rush
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912I used to wait tables here & waited on the likes of the Baldwin brothers, Oprah Winfrey & Harry Carey.

properties.name: The Academia bridge
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912The only wooden bridge left in Venice, very near the apartment we rent when visiting.

properties.name: The Breslin Center
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912

properties.name: The Lansing Lugnuts
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912AAA baseball team, Thirsty Thursday\'s area riot

properties.name: The Lansing Oar & Paddle Club
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912

properties.name: The Ledges at Fitzgerald Park
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912Fitzgerald park, frisbee golf, rock ledges, home of Grand Ledge Opera House

properties.name: The Riviera Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912 A popular EL college hangout

properties.name: The Temple Club
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912An old church converted into a club known for there eclectic bands.

properties.name: Thomas M. Cooley Law School
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912 The largest law school in the US, a place where I used to work as a pc geek.

properties.name: W.J. Beal Botanical Gardens
properties.description: Posted by Darrell48912Beautiful horticultural gardens just perfect for a stroll with that special someone.
